Ingredients.yellow Peppers: 1/4 cup finely chopped sweet yellow pepper
Ingredients.Red Peppers: 1/4 cup finely chopped sweet red pepper

appetizers.Description: This appetizer of teriyaki meatballs changed so many times due to my family's suggestions that it eventually became a main course. I think the homemade sauce sets these meatballs apart -- Evette Nowicki, Oak Harbor, Washington

Ingredients.Topping: Homeade Topping for the Hawaiian Rolls

appetizers.Description: Sliders are the perfect finger food for any get-together, and this flavorful chicken parmesan version won't disappoint -- Nick Iverson, Denver, Colorado

cold sandwiches.Description: I made these simple yet special cranberry walnut chicken salad sandwiches for a birthday party. Tangy cranberries and crunchy celery pep up the chicken, Lefover turkey works well too -- Shannon Tucker, Land O' Lakes, Florida

Ingredients.Lettuce: 2 leaves Romain lettuce, green leaf, or iceberg

cold sandwiches.Description: This turkey club sandwich is good with a side of macaroni or potato salad. You can also make up some homemade chips as a side.

Ingredients.Steak: 1 1/2 pounds boneless top round or flank steak
Ingredients.Bread: 4 hoagie rolls about 6 inches long, halved lengthwise

hot sandwiches.Description: The Philly cheesesteak. It's not just a sandwich. It's downright iconic. Just about the only thing that can make this masterpiece of culinary invention even better is making it with plenty of Cooper Sharp. Try your Philly with that extra kick of Cooper flavor and you'll never want it any other way.

Ingredients.Salt: kosher salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Ingredients.Bread: 4 slices pumpernickel or dark ry bread

hot sandwiches.Description: The pastrami on rye is about as iconic as sandwiches get. Its roots go deep -- created in 1888 at one of New York City's first delis. Maybe that's why it goes so great with Cooper Sharp. Because Cooper's been making mouths water itself since 1893. Put these two on a plate together and that's more than 250 years of tasty history staring you in the face. That's hard to argue with.

Ingredients.Graham Craker: 1 3/4 cups Honey Maid Graham Crackers Crumbs
Ingredients.Cream Cheese: 3 (8 ounce) packages Philadelphia Cream Cheese, softened
Ingredients.Sour Cream: 1 cup Breakstone's or Knudsen Sour Cream

desserts.Description: This cheesecake recipe is our best recipe for cheesecake with a rich and creamy texture and cherry topping for an indulgent dessert that is also easy to make! It is the perfect dessert to serve at your next party.

Ingredients.Crispy Rice Cereal: 5 cups chocolate flavored crispy rice cereal

desserts.Description: I made these coconut chocolate Rice Krispies Treats to change up the normal every day recipe a little bit one day when my 6 year old son and I were looking through the kitchen to see what we could eat.

drinks.Description: Kids and adults alike will be wowed watching this delicious sluch turn from blue to pink and purple in an instant. The magical concoction is made with natural blue tea and refreshing lemonade for a fun science experiment that's tasty too. Perfect for your child's birthday party!

Ingredients.Watermelon: 2 cups chopped seedless watermelon, plus watermelon wedges for garnish
Ingredients.Strawberries: 3/4 cups fresh strawberries, hulled and halved
Ingredients.Yogurt: 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut-milk yogurt (such as So Delicious)

drinks.Description: This creamy vegan watermelon smoothie has a subtle coconut flavor thanks to coconut-milk yogurt. Strawberries add color and banana adds a smooth texture while letting the watermelon flavor shine through.
